Description: As a Sales Associate at HostLegends, you will play a pivotal role in driving the company's growth by identifying and engaging potential clients, understanding their hosting needs, and effectively communicating the value of our hosting solutions. You will work closely with our sales and marketing teams to generate leads, convert prospects into customers, and contribute to achieving our revenue targets. Strong understanding of web hosting services, domains, servers, and related technical concepts.
